column1: 32255-1%1.1.2.1.1.3%Podostemaceae%%N%Torrenticola%%N%%%gen.%Domin%%Domin%Torrenticola%Biblioth. Bot.%22 (Heft 89): t. 35%1928 [Sep 1928]%%Validated by reference to description in Biblioth. Bot. 22 (Heft 89): 150. 1926 where Domin published the name as provisional%%%%%tax. nov.

column5: figs 7-13 [= Biblioth. Bot. Heft 89 (1926) 150] published Podostemon queenslandicus and suggested that the name might belong to a new genus `Torrenticola'. This name has to be regarded as a provisional name only and thus as being not validly published. See further discussion on the valid publication of the name by H.I.Aston
column6: loc. cit. See also comments by A.Engler in Das Pflanzenfam. ed. 2
